inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [no (?) 8]; URC, in pencil: [LB 303]; LRC on back, in pencil: [2145]
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until 2007; sold in November for LAT, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2007-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A. Lepere]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]; LRC on back, in pencil: [Le dèbardeur - le Lundi]
title: The Dockman, Monday
